title: Welcome Message
content: Hello and welcome to our platform!
description: This is a warm welcome message for new users who have just joined.

title: Reminder
content: Don't forget to complete your profile setup.
description: This reminder helps users ensure their profile is complete for better engagement.

title: Promotion
content: Limited-time offer! Get 20% off on your subscription.
description: Promotional message for users to encourage them to subscribe to premium features.
